#############################################
# DEMD Population System
# by Vertimnus
# Do not edit without making corresponding edits to the metascript source code. Bad things will happen!
#############################################

demd_empire_population = {
	value = 0
	every_in_de_jure_hierarchy = {
		limit = { tier = tier_county }
		title_province = {
			 add = var:population
		}
	}
}
